title: Scott Adams Plays Simulationist Jordan Peterson, Harbinger of Religiosity
description:
This week's 3 hour video was likely too much for a number of you stomach. The point is that while religiosity has become the dividing line of empty-public-square status it is inevitable to manifest itself one way or another back into human behavior. A recent video by Scott Adams has him sounding increasingly like a simulationist Jordan Peterson. While Peterson is a scientist, Adams is a hypnotist. 

Peter Boghossian Tweet https://twitter.com/peterboghossian/status/1260280861020184576
Religiosity as IDW Final Frontier https://youtu.be/Mbz3OPZP0EI
Ryan Holiday 7 Keys to Stoicism https://youtu.be/g0lmSRCSGIU
The Un-necessary Pastor of the IDW https://youtu.be/LOfgcFh27nk
Charles Taylor A Secular Age https://amzn.to/35sL1pR
Andrew Root The Pastor in a Secular Age https://amzn.to/3aY7GeO
On the Road with St. Augustine https://amzn.to/2z7fi12
Transubstantiation Book https://amzn.to/2KUBazp
Upload Trailer https://youtu.be/0ZfZj2bn_xg
Ross Douthat with Eric Weinstein on Portal https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/30-ross-douthat-the-rave-before-the-fall/id1469999563?i=1000471686956
Jordan Peterson Death and Resurrection https://youtu.be/xPIanlF6IwM
Scott Adams user interface https://youtu.be/9Ay_P4ze9EU
Red Pilled American Let there be light https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/let-there-be-light/id1439503686?i=1000474068139
Jordan Peterson Personality 12 https://youtu.be/11oBFCNeTAs
Jordan Peterson Choose your Sacrifice https://youtu.be/ZjI7vqizTRc
Hope for Living Stoners https://youtu.be/TSm719HdswU
Ross Douthat The Decadent Society https://amzn.to/2WwRHQW
America Grace Robert Putnam https://amzn.to/35PPoLJ
Unbroken by Laura Hildebrand https://amzn.to/2Z7Zru2
John Vervaeke Inevitable Religio https://youtu.be/FdZlQYtIJ0Q
Nassim Talib Skin in the Game at Google https://youtu.be/uv6KLbkvua8
The Last Battle CS Lewis https://amzn.to/2AurMAR
Mere Christianity CS Lewis https://amzn.to/3ctzKbu
